website_summaries.verdict: This deluxe electric back stretcher offers users a number of different treatment options, not just a passive stretch.
pros: Provides a deep vibration for lower lumbar relief
cons: Does not arch or inflate deep enough for lower back relief
Minimal grip on certain floor surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Could be great
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and functions as it should, but the stretcher doesn't go high enough to serve the purpose of giving relief to lower back. Also it would help if there were some rubber stoppers under the device to stop it from sliding along certain surfaces. When the air pocket was inflating I was getting excited as it was lifting my lower back, but felt let down when it stopped before giving a full stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Jr in NY

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Just what the doctor ordered! I'm a retired massage therapist and this works really well! Even helps with the deep hip rotator muscles in the glute area that can cause low back pain!
customer_reviews.author: David Clem/Wanda Swartling

customer_reviews.title: Best pain relief for lower back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who had surgery on L4 S1 about six years ago. Nothing has helped relieve his pain and he is on his feet working with patients all day. After reading the reviews I decided to buy this for him for Christmas. For the first time since his surgery he has had major pain relief and is actually able to have chiropractic adjustments. My lower back has always hurt when getting up in the mor I g thanks to twenty years of gymnastics and after 2-3 sessions on this, I wake up feeling like a teenager again. It’s definttely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Back in business, thanks to this!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Three bulging discs (L3-L5). Was skeptical but purchased because of the reviews. After just a couple sessions, this replaced paying a hundred bucks for each traction session at a physical therapist. Much better mobility and less nerve pain thanks to this device. Have had it for about three months and still works great. Massage may be a bit too aggressive, but settings with just inflation do the trick too. Would definitely recommend to anyone with lower lumbar issues Best part is the portability. Can take it anywhere, fits in small/medium bag, great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it was worth the money! Works good.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I think it does a really good job. The heat, massage, and expansion work nicely. I wish it would inflate a tad more but I still really like it. FYI. I have a bulging disc. Thats the reason I use it.
customer_reviews.author: eric raven

customer_reviews.title: My husband is in LOVE with this
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in LOVE with this!! Has fallen asleep the last 2 nights while using this. He says it's better than the one that I got him previously from Brookstone that he thought could never be replaced. Love too the size of this unit as it's easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It is well made but I wish the vibration was heavier and there was more control over it
customer_reviews.author: Fredgear

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Provided no relief. Did not inflate enough to make an impact. Hard to position, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, because she's always complain that she had a sore back, and I try to get her something that really work and looks fancy, so I decide to give this I try.., well lucky that I did, after a week of using it, she feel much better than before, this product make her so comfortable, that she really like it and happy about it, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure about this. I used this ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about this. I used this for bulging disc in lower back and the first time using my back hurt. I could barely move or stand up. After a week or so when I calm my back down I will try again. Has anyone else experienced the same after first time use?
customer_reviews.author: MBranch

product_meta.title: iVOLCONN Back Massager Electric Lumbar Traction with Air Pressure,Heating and Vibrating Massage for Lower Back Pain Relief
